title: The Child from the Sea, Part 1 of 2
description: Part One Of Two Parts THE CHILD FROM THE SEA is the story of Lucy Walter, a child of transcendent beauty and spirituality. Born in 17th century England, Lucy grows up to become the secret wife of Charles II. Against the drama of the times and the machinations of the court, such a union had scant hope for success, but as a love match, the marriage remains a beautiful and tender romance. "Suspenseful...powerful...THE CHILD FROM THE SEA casts a magic spell." (Cleveland Plain Dealer)
author: Elizabeth Goudge
